item.description:
Earth Hour 2010. All certified organic produce will be SOLD AT COST and yes, without a carbon footprint!

Spend a memorable Earth Hour with us.*

*This Event will be held at 8:30 in the morning, Saturday, March 27th, twelve hours before the observance of Earth Hour.

This event will be cash only, because our produce will be sold with no markup, and it requires electricity to run credit cards.

Date: Saturday, March 27, 2010
Time: 8:30am - 9:30am
Location: Isador's Fruit & Deli 250 Main Street, Oxford MA 508.987.1211

I hope to see you! -Justin
item.name: Powerless Vegetable Shopping
